FuncDef: This command specifies the egress QoS policy applicable to this SLA profile. The policy must already be defined in theconfig>qos>sap-egresscontext.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the egress policy to be applied to the egress SLA profile. Values-1 to 65535.
Specifies if a host queue with the port-parent option enabled should be scheduled within the context of a Vport port scheduler policy or a the port s port scheduler policy.
